column2: Border security is a way to effectively honor our responsibilities.
column4: Here are the facts there is no massive wave of migrants pouring into California. Overall immigrant apprehensions on the border last year were as low as theyve been in nearly 50 years (and 85 percent of the apprehensions occurred outside of California).

column4: So now they take drugs, literally, and they throw it, a hundred pounds of drugs. They throw it over the wall, they have catapults, but they throw it over the wall, and it lands and it hits somebody on the head.
